
Data Cleaning
=============
1. Remove all current customers
2. Can replace outliers with median
3. 


Analysis

1. Outliers




PPT
===
1. 10-12 slides
2. Problem statement (1-2 slides)
3. Assumptions
4. Approach (2-3 slides)
5. Results (only relevant charts with some explaination/observation)
6. Recommendation and concusion
